skills.name: Dark Gust
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 3 times with a whirling gust of darkness. Stuns the enemy for 1 turn with a 20% chance.

skills.name: Double Arrow
skills.description: Shoots two arrows to attack a target enemy and a random enemy. Stuns the enemy if both arrows hit the same target.

skills.name: Spirit's Curse
skills.description: Inflicts damage on the enemy with a curse, increasing the enemy's chance of dealing a Glancing Hit for 3 turns.

skill_effect.name: Glancing Hit
skill_effect.description: Accuracy is reduced by 50% and the chance for the monster to land a Glancing Hit of reduced damage will increase.
